Html:
This is for all classes, but more specifically labelled at the one class it made its bitch.

The bane of all feral tanking druids pre-wrath was resilience. Its my understanding that the mechanic that resilience works on has been removed inside of instances. I still see itemization for this stat inside all, if not most of the models (sry didn't check each one individually). Specifically it seems to be adding points to gear for bear form druids where it is not merited. While the itemization of the armor bonus not being removed on many of the pvp sets still makes it an attractive lure the lack of critablity through talent points should negate all but the DoT effects that resilience helped mitigate.

Can this be verified and removed from the model?



Thanks all those directly involved and contributors to this program. Its an incredibly valuable peice of work to the WoW community, and greatly appreciated.

Rawr.Bear counts resilience's anti-crit value. Chance to crit below 0% obviously provides no rating. If you have 3/3 SotF, resil should have 0 rating value. If you see otherwise, please post a character showing it.
